command.text: select "PDCIssue"."PDCRID" "PDCRID" ,"PDCIssue"."PDCType" "PDCType" ,"PDCIssue"."PDCNO" "PDCNO" ,"PDCIssue"."PDCPreFix" "PDCPreFix" ,"PDCIssue"."PDCDate" "PDCDate" ,"PDCIssue"."Address" "Address" ,"PDCIssue"."PayCatID" "PayCatID" ,"PayCat"."Category" "PayCatCategory" ,"PDCIssue"."ModeofReceiptID" "ModeofReceiptID" ,"ModeofReceipt"."Description" "ModeofReceiptDescription" ,"PDCIssue"."ChequeNo" "ChequeNo" ,"Cheque"."LeafNumber" "ChequeLeafNumber" ,"ChequeChequeBook"."ChequeBookNo" "ChequeChequeBookChequeBookNo" ,"ChequeChequeBookAccFund"."AccFundName" "ChequeChequeBookAccFundAccFundName" ,"ChequeChequeBookCoaDetail"."AccName" "ChequeChequeBookCoaDetailAccName" ,"PDCIssue"."BankName" "BankName" ,"PDCIssue"."BranchName" "BranchName" ,"PDCIssue"."Amount" "Amount" ,"PDCIssue"."IsSameAmount" "IsSameAmount" ,"PDCIssue"."NoOfPdc" "NoOfPdc" ,"PDCIssue"."Gname" "Gname" ,"PDCIssue"."GFathersname" "GFathersname" ,"PDCIssue"."GAddress" "GAddress" ,"PDCIssue"."OtherRemarks" "OtherRemarks" ,"PDCIssue"."DisplayAction" "DisplayAction" ,"PDCIssue"."AccFundID" "AccFundID" ,"AccFund"."AccFundName" "AccFundAccFundName" ,"PDCIssue"."PayeeCode" "PayeeCode" ,"Payee"."AccSubName" "PayeeAccSubName" ,"PayeeAccSubType"."AccSubType" "PayeeAccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"PDCIssue"."HeadOfExpense" "HeadOfExpense" ,"HeadOfExpense"."AccName" "HeadOfExpenseAccName" ,"HeadOfExpenseAccBalType"."AccBalType" "HeadOfExpenseAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"HeadOfExpenseAccCurrency"."AccCurrencyName" "HeadOfExpenseAccCurrencyAccCurrencyName" ,"HeadOfExpenseAccDest"."AccDest" "HeadOfExpenseAccDestAccDest" ,"HeadOfExpenseAccDestCompanyType"."Description" "HeadOfExpenseAccDestCompanyTypeDescription" ,"HeadOfExpenseAccFund"."AccFundName" "HeadOfExpenseAccFundAccFundName" ,"HeadOfExpenseAccSubType"."AccSubType" "HeadOfExpenseAccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"HeadOfExpenseAccType"."AccType" "HeadOfExpenseAccTypeAccType" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaControl"."AccName" "HeadOfExpenseCoaControlAccName" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalType" "HeadOfExpenseCoaControlAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaControlAccDest"."AccDest" "HeadOfExpenseCoaControlAccDestAccDest" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaControlAccType"."AccType" "HeadOfExpenseCoaControlAccTypeAccType" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaControlCompType"."Description" "HeadOfExpenseCoaControlCompTypeDescription" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaMain"."AccName" "HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccName" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccBalType"."AccBalType" "HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccDest"."AccDest" "HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccDestAccDest" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccFund"."AccFundName" "HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccFundAccFundName" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccType"."AccType" "HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccTypeAccType" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaMainCoaControl"."AccName" "HeadOfExpenseCoaMainCoaControlAccName" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaSub"."AccName" "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccName" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccBalType"."AccBalType" "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccDest"."AccDest" "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccDestAccDest" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccFund"."AccFundName" "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccFundAccFundName" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccType"."AccType" "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccTypeAccType" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaSubCoaControl"."AccName" "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubCoaControlAccName" ,"HeadOfExpenseCoaSubCoaMain"."AccName" "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubCoaMainAccName" ,"PDCIssue"."BankAccountHOA" "BankAccountHOA" ,"BankAccountHOA"."AccName" "BankAccountHOAAccName" ,"BankAccountHOAAccBalType"."AccBalType" "BankAccountHOAAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"BankAccountHOAAccCurrency"."AccCurrencyName" "BankAccountHOAAccCurrencyAccCurrencyName" ,"BankAccountHOAAccDest"."AccDest" "BankAccountHOAAccDestAccDest" ,"BankAccountHOAAccDestCompanyType"."Description" "BankAccountHOAAccDestCompanyTypeDescription" ,"BankAccountHOAAccFund"."AccFundName" "BankAccountHOAAccFundAccFundName" ,"BankAccountHOAAccSubType"."AccSubType" "BankAccountHOAAccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"BankAccountHOAAccType"."AccType" "BankAccountHOAAccTypeAccType" ,"BankAccountHOACoaControl"."AccName" "BankAccountHOACoaControlAccName" ,"BankAccountHOACoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalType" "BankAccountHOACoaControlAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"BankAccountHOACoaControlAccDest"."AccDest" "BankAccountHOACoaControlAccDestAccDest" ,"BankAccountHOACoaControlAccType"."AccType" "BankAccountHOACoaControlAccTypeAccType" ,"BankAccountHOACoaControlCompType"."Description" "BankAccountHOACoaControlCompTypeDescription" ,"BankAccountHOACoaMain"."AccName" "BankAccountHOACoaMainAccName" ,"BankAccountHOACoaMainAccBalType"."AccBalType" "BankAccountHOACoaMainAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"BankAccountHOACoaMainAccDest"."AccDest" "BankAccountHOACoaMainAccDestAccDest" ,"BankAccountHOACoaMainAccFund"."AccFundName" "BankAccountHOACoaMainAccFundAccFundName" ,"BankAccountHOACoaMainAccType"."AccType" "BankAccountHOACoaMainAccTypeAccType" ,"BankAccountHOACoaMainCoaControl"."AccName" "BankAccountHOACoaMainCoaControlAccName" ,"BankAccountHOACoaSub"."AccName" "BankAccountHOACoaSubAccName" ,"BankAccountHOACoaSubAccBalType"."AccBalType" "BankAccountHOACoaSubAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"BankAccountHOACoaSubAccDest"."AccDest" "BankAccountHOACoaSubAccDestAccDest" ,"BankAccountHOACoaSubAccFund"."AccFundName" "BankAccountHOACoaSubAccFundAccFundName" ,"BankAccountHOACoaSubAccType"."AccType" "BankAccountHOACoaSubAccTypeAccType" ,"BankAccountHOACoaSubCoaControl"."AccName" "BankAccountHOACoaSubCoaControlAccName" ,"BankAccountHOACoaSubCoaMain"."AccName" "BankAccountHOACoaSubCoaMainAccName" from "dbo"."PDCIssue" "PDCIssue" left join "dbo"."Paycategory" "PayCat" on "PDCIssue"."PayCatID" = "PayCat"."PayCatID" left join "dbo"."ModeofReceipts" "ModeofReceipt" on "PDCIssue"."ModeofReceiptID" = "ModeofReceipt"."ModeofReceiptID" left join "dbo"."ChequeBooksLeaf" "Cheque" on "PDCIssue"."ChequeNo" = "Cheque"."LeafID" left join "dbo"."ChequeBooks" "ChequeChequeBook" on "Cheque"."ChequeBookID" = "ChequeChequeBook"."ChequeBookID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "ChequeChequeBookAccFund" on "ChequeChequeBook"."AccFundID" = "ChequeChequeBookAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."CoaDetail" "ChequeChequeBookCoaDetail" on "ChequeChequeBook"."CoaDetailID" = "ChequeChequeBookCoaDetail"."CoaDetailID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "AccFund" on "PDCIssue"."AccFundID" = "AccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccSubNames" "Payee" on "PDCIssue"."PayeeCode" = "Payee"."AccSubCode" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "PayeeAccSubType" on "Payee"."AccSubTypeID" = "PayeeAccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaDetail" "HeadOfExpense" on "PDCIssue"."HeadOfExpense" = "HeadOfExpense"."CoaDetailID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "HeadOfExpenseAccBalType" on "HeadOfExpense"."AccBalTypeID" = "HeadOfExpenseAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccCurrencys" "HeadOfExpenseAccCurrency" on "HeadOfExpense"."AccCurrency" = "HeadOfExpenseAccCurrency"."AccCurrencyID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "HeadOfExpenseAccDest" on "HeadOfExpense"."AccDestID" = "HeadOfExpenseAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "HeadOfExpenseAccDestCompanyType" on "HeadOfExpenseAccDest"."CompanyType" = "HeadOfExpenseAccDestCompanyType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "HeadOfExpenseAccFund" on "HeadOfExpense"."AccFundID" = "HeadOfExpenseAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "HeadOfExpenseAccSubType" on "HeadOfExpense"."AccSubTypeID" = "HeadOfExpenseAccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "HeadOfExpenseAccType" on "HeadOfExpense"."AccTypeID" = "HeadOfExpenseAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "HeadOfExpenseCoaControl" on "HeadOfExpense"."CoaControlID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "HeadOfExpenseCoaControlAccBalType" on "HeadOfExpenseCoaControl"."AccBalTypeID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "HeadOfExpenseCoaControlAccDest" on "HeadOfExpenseCoaControl"."AccDestID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaControlAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "HeadOfExpenseCoaControlAccType" on "HeadOfExpenseCoaControl"."AccTypeID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaControlAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "HeadOfExpenseCoaControlCompType" on "HeadOfExpenseCoaControl"."CompType" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaControlCompType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaMain" "HeadOfExpenseCoaMain" on "HeadOfExpense"."CoaMainID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaMain"."CoaMainID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccBalType" on "HeadOfExpenseCoaMain"."AccBalTypeID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccDest" on "HeadOfExpenseCoaMain"."AccDestID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccFund" on "HeadOfExpenseCoaMain"."AccFundID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccType" on "HeadOfExpenseCoaMain"."AccTypeID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaMainAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "HeadOfExpenseCoaMainCoaControl" on "HeadOfExpenseCoaMain"."CoaControlID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaMainCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."CoaSub" "HeadOfExpenseCoaSub" on "HeadOfExpense"."CoaSubID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaSub"."CoaSubID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccBalType" on "HeadOfExpenseCoaSub"."AccBalTypeID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccDest" on "HeadOfExpenseCoaSub"."AccDestID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccFund" on "HeadOfExpenseCoaSub"."AccFundID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccType" on "HeadOfExpenseCoaSub"."AccTypeID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubCoaControl" on "HeadOfExpenseCoaSub"."CoaControlID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."CoaMain" "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubCoaMain" on "HeadOfExpenseCoaSub"."CoaMainID" = "HeadOfExpenseCoaSubCoaMain"."CoaMainID" left join "dbo"."CoaDetail" "BankAccountHOA" on "PDCIssue"."BankAccountHOA" = "BankAccountHOA"."CoaDetailID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "BankAccountHOAAccBalType" on "BankAccountHOA"."AccBalTypeID" = "BankAccountHOAAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccCurrencys" "BankAccountHOAAccCurrency" on "BankAccountHOA"."AccCurrency" = "BankAccountHOAAccCurrency"."AccCurrencyID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "BankAccountHOAAccDest" on "BankAccountHOA"."AccDestID" = "BankAccountHOAAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "BankAccountHOAAccDestCompanyType" on "BankAccountHOAAccDest"."CompanyType" = "BankAccountHOAAccDestCompanyType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "BankAccountHOAAccFund" on "BankAccountHOA"."AccFundID" = "BankAccountHOAAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "BankAccountHOAAccSubType" on "BankAccountHOA"."AccSubTypeID" = "BankAccountHOAAccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "BankAccountHOAAccType" on "BankAccountHOA"."AccTypeID" = "BankAccountHOAAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "BankAccountHOACoaControl" on "BankAccountHOA"."CoaControlID" = "BankAccountHOACoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "BankAccountHOACoaControlAccBalType" on "BankAccountHOACoaControl"."AccBalTypeID" = "BankAccountHOACoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "BankAccountHOACoaControlAccDest" on "BankAccountHOACoaControl"."AccDestID" = "BankAccountHOACoaControlAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "BankAccountHOACoaControlAccType" on "BankAccountHOACoaControl"."AccTypeID" = "BankAccountHOACoaControlAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "BankAccountHOACoaControlCompType" on "BankAccountHOACoaControl"."CompType" = "BankAccountHOACoaControlCompType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaMain" "BankAccountHOACoaMain" on "BankAccountHOA"."CoaMainID" = "BankAccountHOACoaMain"."CoaMainID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "BankAccountHOACoaMainAccBalType" on "BankAccountHOACoaMain"."AccBalTypeID" = "BankAccountHOACoaMainAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "BankAccountHOACoaMainAccDest" on "BankAccountHOACoaMain"."AccDestID" = "BankAccountHOACoaMainAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "BankAccountHOACoaMainAccFund" on "BankAccountHOACoaMain"."AccFundID" = "BankAccountHOACoaMainAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "BankAccountHOACoaMainAccType" on "BankAccountHOACoaMain"."AccTypeID" = "BankAccountHOACoaMainAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "BankAccountHOACoaMainCoaControl" on "BankAccountHOACoaMain"."CoaControlID" = "BankAccountHOACoaMainCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."CoaSub" "BankAccountHOACoaSub" on "BankAccountHOA"."CoaSubID" = "BankAccountHOACoaSub"."CoaSubID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "BankAccountHOACoaSubAccBalType" on "BankAccountHOACoaSub"."AccBalTypeID" = "BankAccountHOACoaSubAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "BankAccountHOACoaSubAccDest" on "BankAccountHOACoaSub"."AccDestID" = "BankAccountHOACoaSubAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "BankAccountHOACoaSubAccFund" on "BankAccountHOACoaSub"."AccFundID" = "BankAccountHOACoaSubAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "BankAccountHOACoaSubAccType" on "BankAccountHOACoaSub"."AccTypeID" = "BankAccountHOACoaSubAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "BankAccountHOACoaSubCoaControl" on "BankAccountHOACoaSub"."CoaControlID" = "BankAccountHOACoaSubCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."CoaMain" "BankAccountHOACoaSubCoaMain" on "BankAccountHOACoaSub"."CoaMainID" = "BankAccountHOACoaSubCoaMain"."CoaMainID"

action.data:
declare @pdcrreceiptRef nvarchar(50) exec UPS_PDCIssue @PDCDate, @PayeeCode, @PayCatID,@ModeofReceiptID, @Amount, @NoOfPdc, @OtherRemarks,@IsSameAmount,@ChequeNo,@BankName, @BranchName,@AccFundID, @HeadOfExpense, @BankAccountHOA, @pdcrreceiptRef output if (@pdcrreceiptRef is not null ) begin set @Result_ShowAlert = @pdcrreceiptRef+' is saved' set @Result_NavigateUrl ='InwardPDCEntry.aspx'
end
